decks.notes: The main concept of this UR Aggro deck is to use cheap and efficient spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan while deploying creatures like Murktide Regent and Dragon's Rage Channeler to quickly close out the game. The deck aims to maintain tempo advantage by utilizing cards like Daze and Force of Will to protect its threats and control the board. With a low mana curve and card draw/filtering options like Ponder and Brainstorm, the deck focuses on quickly establishing a threatening board presence and pressuring the opponent's life total.

This deck focuses on quickly assembling the Coveted Jewel combo using cards like Transmute Artifact and Grim Monolith. The goal is to generate a large mana advantage, allowing for explosive plays with The One Ring or Emrakul, the Aeons Torn. Control elements like Force of Will and Sink into Stupor help protect the combo pieces, while cards like Show and Tell can help cheat out powerful threats. The deck relies on maximizing mana production and card advantage to overwhelm opponents and win the game in a single explosive turn.

The deck focuses on quickly getting out either Emrakul, the Aeons Torn or Omniscience onto the battlefield using cards like Show and Tell, Cunning Wish, and Stock Up. By cheating these powerful cards into play early, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and win the game in just a few turns. Utilizing a mix of counterspells and card draw spells, the deck aims to protect its key combo pieces while digging for important cards. The deck relies on explosive plays and careful decision making to secure victory.
